strapiPost.title: Arkansas Soccer And Volleyball Season Tickets On Sale Now
strapiPost.content:
The Razorback Volleyball and Soccer teams are gearing up for another competitive season, and season tickets are now on sale so that you can catch these dynamic teams in action.

  • Bump, set, spike: The volleyball schedule has the Razorbacks home at Barnhill for 15 matches this season. General admission season tickets start at $40.
  • Kick it with the Hogs: The soccer squad will host 9 home matches, beginning with an exhibition vs. Kansas State on Aug 7. Season tickets are $25 for adults and $15 for children and include a newly designed scarf with purchase.

Keep up with Razorback Athletics HERE.
